This truly is the most game ever. I cant comprehend the amount that went into this. Turly inspiring. Awe-mazing! When i get a kill, i go "BAZINGA" in my head and then i laugh out loud (lol). This game made me stop having intercourse with various clothing items around my house, sometimes i use vegetables like cucumbers and carrots to achieve anal orgasm. Anyway, playing csgo is like playing real life. I am a former [REDACTED]. With my time in SPEC OPS i can say this is the most simulation of counter terror operations ever. Only thing i would like added is civilians so i can simulate real life (i shoot them). With my 15 confirmed kills and 2 purple hearts i can confidently say that this is just like being deployed in syria. Fighting russians and arabs who conduct terror operations in various desert towns (shitholes lmao).
Anyway, this is the most game of the century, it certainly is of our time. 
/10
